info.description:
ConsenSys Codefi Orchestrate API. Enables dynamic management of transactions, identities, chains, faucets and contracts.
Transaction Requests are an abstraction over schedules and jobs representing one or more transactions executed on the Blockchain network
Schedules are ordered lists of jobs executed in a predefined sequence
Jobs represent single transaction flows executed on the Blockchain network
Chains represent list of endpoints pointing to a Blockchain network
Faucets represent funded accounts (holding ETH) linked to specific chains, allowed to fund newly created accounts automatically for them to be able to send transactions.
Accounts represent Ethereum accounts (private keys). By usage of the generated cryptographic key pair, accounts can be used to sign/verify and to encrypt/decrypt messages.
Contracts represent Solidity contracts management.
info.title: Orchestrate API

get.description: Get a list of filtered accounts

post.description: Creates a new Account by importing a private key
post.summary: Creates a new Account by importing a private key

post.description: Verifies if a message has been signed by the Ethereum account passed as argument

post.summary: Verifies the signature of a typed data message following the EIP-712 standard

get.description: Fetch a single account by address

patch.description: Update a specific account by Address

post.description: Sign message, following EIP-191, data using selected account
Signs typed data using ECDSA and the private key of an existing account following the EIP-712 standard
post.summary: Signs typed data using an existing account following the EIP-712 standard

Update a specific job by UUID
WARNING: Reserved for advanced users. Orchestrate does not recommend using this endpoint.

409.description: Job in invalid state for the given status update

put.description: Resend transaction of specific job by UUID, effectively executing the re-sending of transaction asynchronously
Starts a specific job by UUID, effectively executing the transaction asynchronously

get.description: Fetch a single schedule by uuid
Get a list of filtered transaction requests
get.summary: Search transaction requests by provided filters

post.description:
Creates and executes a new contract deployment request
The transaction can be private (Tessera, EEA).
The transaction can be a One Time Key transaction in 0 gas private networks
post.summary: Creates and sends a new contract deployment

post.description:
Creates and executes a new smart contract transaction request
The transaction can be private (Tessera, EEA).
The transaction can be a One Time Key transaction in 0 gas private networks
post.summary: Creates and sends a new contract transaction

post.description: Creates and executes a new raw transaction request
post.summary: Creates and sends a raw transaction

post.description: Creates and executes a new transfer request
post.summary: Creates and sends a transfer transaction

get.description: Fetch a single transaction request by uuid
get.summary: Fetch a transaction request by uuid

put.description: Call of transaction by sending empty data transaction with same nonce and additional 10% more gas
Speed up transaction time by an increase its gas price
put.summary: Speed up transaction timeIncrease transaction gas price

parameters.description: gas price increment percentage, default value is 0.05 (5%)
parameters.name: boost

createdAt.description: Date and time that the private transaction manager was registered with the chain.

uuid.description: UUID of the private transaction manager.

address.description:
DATA (20 Bytes) - Address from which log originated
e.g 0xAf84242d70aE9D268E2bE3616ED497BA28A7b62C

block_hash.description:
DATA (32 Bytes) - Hash of the block where this transaction was in.
e.g. 0x656c34545f90a730a19008c0e7a7cd4fb3895064b48d6d69761bd5abad681056

block_number.description: QUANTITY - Block number where this transaction was in

data.description: DATA - Non-indexed arguments of the log

index.description: QUANTITY - Integer of the log index position in the block

removed.description: Removed field is true if this log was reverted due to a chain reorganisation.

topics.description:
Array of DATA (32 Bytes) - Array of 0 to 4 indexed log arguments
e.g. 0xddf252ad1be2c89b69c2b068fc378daa952ba7f163c4a11628f55a4df523b3ef

tx_hash.description:
DATA (32 Bytes) - Hash of the transaction.
e.g. 0x3b198bfd5d2907285af009e9ae84a0ecd63677110d89d7e030251acb87f6487e

tx_index.description: QUANTITY - Integer of the transactions index position in the block.

block_hash.description:
HASH (32 Bytes) - Hash of the block where this transaction was in.
e.g. 0x656c34545f90a730a19008c0e7a7cd4fb3895064b48d6d69761bd5abad681056

block_number.description: QUANTITY - Block number where this transaction was in.

bloom.description: DATA (256 Bytes) - Bloom filter of logs/events generated by contracts during transaction execution.

contract_address.description:
DATA (20 Bytes) - The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation
e.g 0xAf84242d70aE9D268E2bE3616ED497BA28A7b62C

cumulative_gas_used.description: QUANTITY - The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block.

effective_gas_price.description: Equal to the actual gas price paid for inclusion

gas_used.description: QUANTITY - The amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone.

logs.description: Array - Array of log objects, which this transaction generated.

output.description:
DATA - RLP-encoded return value of a contract call for EEA Priv Tx
Provisional till we migrate to TransactionManager Jobs

post_state.description:
DATA (32 Bytes) - State root hash after executing transaction
e.g. 0x656c34545f90a730a19008c0e7a7cd4fb3895064b48d6d69761bd5abad681056

privacyGroupId.description:
DATA (32 bytes) - EEA public keys or privacy group ID of the recipients.
e.g Ko2bVqD+nNlNYL5EE7y3IdOnviftjiizpjRt+HTuFBs=

privateFrom.description:
DATA (32 bytes) - EEA public key of the sender.
e.g A1aVtMxLCUHmBVHXoZzzBgPbW/wj5axDpW9X8l91SGo=

revert_reason.description: DATA - Revert reason if the transaction failed

status.description: QUANTITY - 0 indicates transaction failure , 1 indicates transaction success.

tx_hash.description:
HASH (32 Bytes) - Hash of the transaction.
e.g 0x3b198bfd5d2907285af009e9ae84a0ecd63677110d89d7e030251acb87f6487e

tx_index.description: QUANTITY - Integer of the transactions index position in the block.

storeID.description: ID of the Quorum Key Manager store containing the account.

abi.example: [{anonymous: false, inputs: [{indexed: false, name: account, type: address}, name: MinterAdded, type: event}]}]

attributes.description: Additional information attached to the account.

compressedPublicKey.description: Compressed public key of the account.

createdAt.description: Date and time at which the account was created.

storeID.description: ID of the Quorum Key Manager store containing the account.

tenantID.description: ID of the tenant executing the API.

updatedAt.description: Date and time at which the account details were updated.

createdAt.description: Date and time at which the chain was registered.

listenerBackOffDuration.description: Time to wait before trying to fetch a new mined block.

listenerDepth.description: Block depth after which the Transaction Listener considers a block final and processes it.

listenerExternalTxEnabled.description: Whether the chain listens for external transactions not crafted by Orchestrate.

listenerStartingBlock.description: Block at which the Transaction Listener starts processing transactions

privateTxManagerURL.description: Private tx manager required by go-quorum for sending private txs

tenantID.description: ID of the tenant executing the API.

updatedAt.description: Date and time at which the chain details were updated.

urls.description: URLs of Ethereum nodes connected to.

abi.example: [{anonymous: false, inputs: [{indexed: false, name: account, type: address}, name: MinterAdded, type: event}]}]

attributes.description: Additional information attached to the account.

chain.description: Name of the chain. This value should match the chain name defined in the chain creation.

storeID.description: ID of the Quorum Key Manager store containing the account.

chainUUID.description: UUID of the chain on which to create the job.

scheduleUUID.description: UUID of the schedule on which to create the job.

accessList.description: Optional list of addresses and storage keys the transaction plans to access.

contractTag.description: Optional tag attached to the contract.

gasPrice.description: If sending a non-[EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the gas price, in Wei, provided by the sender.

mandatoryFor.description: When sending a private transaction with [mandatory party protection](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/stable/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#mandatory-party-protection), a list of the recipients' public keys.

maxFeePerGas.description: If sending an [EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the maximum total fee, in Wei, the sender is willing to pay per gas.

maxPriorityFeePerGas.description: If sending an [EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the maximum fee, in Wei, the sender is willing to pay per gas above the base fee.

oneTimeKey.description: Indicates if the transaction is a One Time Key transaction.

privacyFlag.description: Set to 0 for standard privacy (default), 1 for [counter-party protection](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/stable/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#counter-party-protection), 2 for [mandatory party protection](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/stable/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#mandatory-party-protection), and 3 for [private state validation](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/latest/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#private-state-validation).

privacyGroupId.description: When sending a private transaction, the privacy group ID of the recipients. Not used with `PrivateFor`.

privateFor.description: When sending a private transaction, a list of the recipients' public keys. Not used with `PrivacyGroupID`.

privateFrom.description: When sending a private transaction, the sender's public key.

transactionType.description: `dynamic_fee` for a post-London fork transaction, `legacy` for a pre-London fork transaction.

chain.description: Name of the chain on which to deploy the contract.

amount.description: Amount, in Wei, sent to the beneficiary on each funding transaction.

chainRule.description: Name of the chain on which the faucet is registered.

cooldown.description: Waiting time in between two funding transactions to the same beneficiary.

createdAt.description: Date and time at which the faucet was registered.

creditorAccount.description: Address of the faucet creditor's account.

maxBalance.description: Expected maximum balance of beneficiary. It won't fund past this value.

tenantID.description: ID of the tenant executing the API.

updatedAt.description: Date and time at which the faucet details were updated.

priority.description: Intended transaction velocity, default is `medium`. Transaction gas is adjusted depending on the velocity to optimize the mining time on user request.

attributes.description: Additional information attached to the account.

chain.description: Name of the chain. This value should match the chain name defined in the chain creation.

storeID.description: ID of the Quorum Key Manager store containing the account.

chainUUID.description: UUID of the chain on which the job was created.

createdAt.description: Date and time at which the job was created.

scheduleUUID.description: UUID of the schedule on which the job was created.

tenantID.description: ID of the tenant executing the API.

updatedAt.description: Date and time at which the job details were updated.

chain.description: Name of the chain on which to send the transaction.

labels.description: List of custom labels. Useful for adding custom information to the chain.

name.description: Name of the chain. Must be unique.

privateTxManagerURL.description: Private tx manager required by go-quorum for sending private txs

urls.description: List of URLs of Ethereum nodes to connect to.

tag.description: Optional tag attached to the contract.

amount.description: Amount, in Wei, sent to the beneficiary on each funding transaction.

chainRule.description: Name of the chain on which to register the faucet.

cooldown.description: Waiting time in between two funding transactions to the same beneficiary.

creditorAccount.description: Address of the faucet creditor's account.

maxBalance.description: Expected maximum balance of beneficiary. It won't fund past this value.

backOffDuration.description: Time to wait before trying to fetch a new mined block (for example `1s` or `1m`, default is `5s`).

depth.description: Block depth after which the Transaction Listener considers a block final and processes it (default 0).

externalTxEnabled.description: Whether to listen to external transactions not crafted by Orchestrate (default `false`).

fromBlock.description: Block from which the Transaction Listener should start processing transactions (default `latest`).

increment.description: Gas increment for each retry. For example, set `0.05` for a 5% increment.

limit.description: Maximum gas increment over retries. For example, set `0.5` for a 50% gas increment from source transaction.

createdAt.description: Date and time at which the schedule was created.

jobs.description: List of jobs on the schedule.

tenantID.description: ID of the tenant executing the API.

chain.description: Name of the chain on which to send the transaction.

storeID.description: ID of the Quorum Key Manager store containing the account.

accessList.description: Optional list of addresses and storage keys the transaction plans to access.

contractTag.description: Optional tag attached to the contract.

gasPrice.description: If sending a non-[EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the gas price, in Wei, provided by the sender.

mandatoryFor.description: When sending a private transaction with [mandatory party protection](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/stable/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#mandatory-party-protection), a list of the recipients' public keys.

maxFeePerGas.description: If sending an [EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the maximum total fee, in Wei, the sender is willing to pay per gas.

maxPriorityFeePerGas.description: If sending an [EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the maximum fee, in Wei, the sender is willing to pay per gas above the base fee.

oneTimeKey.description: Indicates if the transaction is a One Time Key transaction.

privacyFlag.description: Set to 0 for standard privacy (default), 1 for [counter-party protection](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/stable/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#counter-party-protection), 2 for [mandatory party protection](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/stable/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#mandatory-party-protection), and 3 for [private state validation](https://consensys.net/docs/goquorum/en/latest/concepts/privacy/privacy-enhancements/#private-state-validation).

privacyGroupId.description: When sending a private transaction, the privacy group ID of the recipients. Not used with `PrivateFor`.

privateFor.description: When sending a private transaction, a list of the recipients' public keys. Not used with `PrivacyGroupID`.

privateFrom.description: When sending a private transaction, the sender's public key.

to.description: Address of the recipient, mutually exclusive with `from`.

transactionType.description: `dynamic_fee` for a post-London fork transaction, `legacy` for a pre-London fork transaction.

chain.description: Chain on which the transaction was created.

createdAt.description: Date and time at which the transaction was created.

idempotencyKey.description: Idempotency key of the transaction request.

jobs.description: List of jobs in the transaction.

accessList.description: Optional list of addresses and storage keys the transaction plans to access.

gasPrice.description: If sending a non-[EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the gas price, in Wei, provided by the sender.

maxFeePerGas.description: If sending an [EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the maximum total fee, in Wei, the sender is willing to pay per gas.

maxPriorityFeePerGas.description: If sending an [EIP1559 transaction](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Concepts/Transactions/Transaction-Types/#eip1559-transactions), the maximum fee, in Wei, the sender is willing to pay per gas above the base fee.

to.description: Address of the recipient, mutually exclusive with `from`.

transactionType.description: `dynamic_fee` for a post-London fork transaction, `legacy` for a pre-London fork transaction.

chain.description: Name of the chain on which to send the transaction.

attributes.description: Additional information attached to the account.

storeID.description: ID of the Quorum Key Manager store containing the account.

labels.description: List of custom labels. Useful for adding custom information to the chain.

name.description: Name of the chain. Must be unique.

amount.description: Amount, in Wei, sent to the beneficiary on each funding transaction.

chainRule.description: Name of the chain on which to register the faucet.

cooldown.description: Waiting time in between two funding transactions to the same beneficiary.

creditorAccount.description: Address of the faucet creditor's account.

maxBalance.description: Expected maximum balance of beneficiary. It won't fund past this value.

backOffDuration.description: Time to wait before trying to fetch a new mined block (for example `1s` or `1m`, default is `5s`).

depth.description: Block depth after which the Transaction Listener considers a block final and processes it (default 0).

externalTxEnabled.description: Whether to listen to external transactions not crafted by Orchestrate (default `false`).
